Model

Class CTS_Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.CTS_Model

  • public class CTS_Model
extends java.lang.Object
    The main model used by the project. Stores all objects being displayed by the project.
    Author:
    Joey McMaster, Nicholas Fiegel, Matt Theisen, Jackson

    • Constructor Detail

      • CTS_Model

        public CTS_Model()
        Basic constructor for a model. Defaults to the Western constellations, at latitude/longitude 0, at 12:00 AM on Jan. 1, 2000.

      • CTS_Model

        public CTS_Model(double latitude,
                 double longitude,
                 double daysSinceStandard,
                 double universaltime)
        Constructs the model with the given params
        Parameters:
        latitude - The latitude on earth of where the observer will be
        longitude - The longitude on earth where the observer will be.
        daysSinceStandard - Days since the year 2000
        universaltime - Time of day of where the observer will be.

      • build_constellationList

        public boolean build_constellationList(java.lang.String fileName)
        Builds the list of CTS_Constellation objects, given a file name. The file should be in the Stellarium fab format. ASSUMES: the file resides in the src/Resources directory.
        Parameters:
        fileName - A String indicating the name of the file to use.
        Returns:
        If it was successful or not.

      • build_constellationDBMap

        public void build_constellationDBMap()
        Builds the constellationDBs HashMap associating the name of a culture with the database containing their constellations by Hipparcus catalog number. WARNING: has no error checking of the ConstellationDB_List.csv file, and assumes it has no empty lines.

      • build_PlanetList

        public void build_PlanetList()

      • getStarByHip

        public CTS_Star getStarByHip(int hip)
        Finds and returns a CTS_Star object by the hip field.
        Parameters:
        hip - An int indicating the star's Hipparcus catalog number
        Returns:
        a CTS_Star object with the matching hip number, if found, or null

      • getLocalSiderialTime

        public double getLocalSiderialTime()
        Returns the local siderial time. ASSUMES: daysSinceStand is set to the decimal days since J2000 ASSUMES: universalTime is appropriately set
        Returns:
        a double representing the local siderial time for the star

      • calcDaysSinceStandard

        public void calcDaysSinceStandard(int year,
                                  int month,
                                  int day,
                                  int hour,
                                  int minutes,
                                  int seconds)
        Helper method to calculate and set the days since J2000. The time should be in UT.
        Parameters:
        year - an integer representing the year, CE is positive, BCE is negative
        month - an integer representation of the month, 1 = Jan, 2 = Feb, ...
        day - an integer representing the day of the month
        hour - an integer representing the hour (0-23)
        minutes - an integer representing the minutes
        seconds - an integer representing the seconds

      • getDaysSinceStandard

        public double getDaysSinceStandard()
        Fetches the days from J2000.
        Returns:
        a double indicating the days from J2000
